articles.title: Windows 11 24H2's exclusive AI feature Recall has already been ported to existing hardware - Neowin
articles.description: Windows 11 version 24H2's best feature, Recall, requires new hardware, namely a Copilot+ PC. However, to no one's surprise, enthusiasts have already backported it to existing, even low-end hardware.
articles.content: Recall, the feature Microsoft announced for Windows 11 at its May 20 event, is certainly an interesting addition to the operating system. Unfortunately, getting your hands on it requires buying one o… [+1998 chars]
